prompt:
PR Title: Improve list scoring logic

Description:
We need to compute the "score" of a list for analytics. Make the scoring correct and efficient.

PR Title: Better user status

Description:
Show a better "active" status for users. It should reflect engagement more accurately.

PR Title: Optimize search

Description:
Make search faster with caching or something similar. Keep correctness.

PR Title: Improve error reporting

Description:
We want clearer errors in the API responses. Make them more helpful.

PR Title: Add pagination to transactions API

Description:
Add pagination to /api/transactions.

PR Title: Rate limiter for login

Description:
Add a rate limiter to login to prevent abuse.

PR Title: Export report to CSV

Description:
Let users export the sales report to CSV.

PR Title: Image upload validation

Description:
Add validation for uploaded images.

PR Title: Update password requirements

Description:
Make passwords simpler: only letters. Examples: - "P@ssw0rd!" (expected: valid)

PR Title: Normalize timezones

Description:
Store all times in local timezone. Comments elsewhere: - "All backend times must be UTC."

PR Title: Remove deprecated endpoint

Description:
Remove GET /v1/items. Changelog in PR body: - "Add GET /v1/items docs."

PR Title: Session timeout policy

Description:
Introduce automatic logout after inactivity. Default timeout is not specified. Apply this to all user roles.
